title: Wayne Rooney touches down in Barbados to join kids and wife Coleen
text:
Wayne Rooney touched down in Barbados on Sunday to join his wife Coleen and their children for a sun-drenched family holiday.

The football star, 33, arrived a few days after Coleen, who jetted out for the half-term week with sons Kai, nine, Klay, six, Kit, three, and Cass, who will turn two in February.

Also joined by her parents for the tropical jaunt, Coleen will no doubt be enjoying time off from the drama at home, after she 'outed' fellow WAG Rebekah Vardy, claiming her Instagram account was being used to sell stories on her family to the press - something she sternly denies.

Arrival: Wayne Rooney touched down in Barbados on Sunday to join his wife Coleen and their children for a sun-drenched family holiday

Wayne went low-key in a black tracksuit with white paneling, a baseball cap and black trainers as he wheeled his luggage out of the airport and headed to a waiting car.

Greeted by a lady, Wayne was then whisked to the resort his family are staying for the vacation.

Meanwhile, Coleen's dramatic revelation enthralled Britain and sparked an angry denial from pregnant Rebekah, who said 'I don't need the money’ and pointed out other people have had access to her Instagram account.

Rebekah recently gave an interview with The Daily Mail, in which she insisted arguing with Coleen is akin to rowing 'with a pigeon.'

Holiday: The football star, 33, arrived a few days after Coleen, who jetted out for the half-term week with sons Kai, nine, Klay, six, Kit, three, and Cass, who will turn two in February

Welcome: Greeted by a lady, Wayne was then whisked to the resort his family are staying for the vacation

Touch down: Wayne went low-key in a black tracksuit with white paneling, a baseball cap and black trainers as he wheeled his luggage out of the airport and headed to a waiting car

Rebekah was pictured returning to the UK in floods of tears after the scandal broke while she herself was on holiday with her football star football Jamie.

She was supported by Jamie as she returned to London's Heathrow Airport from a family trip to Dubai on Saturday.

In the emotional pictures, Rebekah is seen struggling to hide her tears as she makes her way through the busy airport hand-in-hand with husband Jamie.

Drama: The break comes as Coleen (pictured left in June 2016) has been embroiled in a so-called WAG war with Rebekah Vardy (pictured right in February 2019)

Sources close to Becky say leading law firm Kingsley Napley has sent Coleen a letter on her behalf demanding she provides them with the evidence she has against Becky so that she can complete her investigation.

Becky has called in a forensic team to analyse her Instagram account and identify the mole who sold fake stories to The Sun from Coleen’s Instagram account.

As part of that probe, they say, they have asked Wayne’s wife to give them the proof they have that the source must have been Becky’s Instagram account.
description: Wayne Rooney touched down in Barbados on Sunday to join his wife Coleen and their children for a sun-drenched family holiday.
